data.title: INDIAN WELLS
data.body:
The BNP Paribas Open is the first of nine ATP World Tour Masters 1000 events and is held in the small city of Indian Wells, California.

The 12-day tournament is the best attended tennis event outside the four Grand Slams.

In 2009, 332,498 spectators passed through the gates, eclipsing the mark set the previous year when it became the first tournament outside of the Grand Slams to pass the 300,000 mark.

Past Winners

2011 Novak Djokovic bt. Rafael Nadal 4-6 6-3 6-2
2010  Ivan Ljubicic bt. Andy Roddick 7-6 7-6
2009  Rafael Nadal bt. Andy Murray 6-1, 6-2
2008  Novak Djokovic bt. Mardy Fish 6-2, 5-7, 6-3
2007  Rafael Nadal bt. Novak Djokovic 6-2, 7-5
2006  Roger Federer bt. James Blake 7-5, 6-3, 6-0
2005  Roger Federer bt. Lleyton Hewitt 6-2, 6-4, 6-4
2004  Roger Federer bt. Tim Henman 6-3, 6-3
2003  Lleyton Hewitt bt. Gustavo Kuerten 6-1, 6-1
2002  Lleyton Hewitt bt. Tim Henman 6-1, 6-2
2001  Andre Agassi bt. Pete Sampras 7-6, 7-5, 6-1
2000  lex Corretja bt. Thomas Enqvist 6-4, 6-4, 6-3

data.title: MIAMI
data.body:
The 12-day Sony Ericsson Open in Miami was voted by the players as the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 tournament of the year for the fifth time in the past six seasons.

Past Winners

2011 Novak Djokovic bt. Rafael Nadal 4-6 6-3 7-6
2010  Andy Roddick bt. Tomas Berdych 7-5, 6-4
2009  Andy Murray bt. Novak Djokovic 6-2, 7-5
2008  Nikolay Davydenko bt. Rafael Nadal 6-4, 6-2
2007  Novak Djokovic bt. Guillermo Canas 6-3, 6-2, 6-4
2006  Roger Federer bt. Ivan Ljubicic 7-6, 7-6, 7-6
2005  Roger Federer bt. Rafael Nadal 2-6, 6-7, 7-6, 6-3, 6-1
2004  Andy Roddick bt. Guillermo Coria 6-7, 6-3, 6-1, retired
2003  Andre Agassi bt. Carlos Moya 6-3, 6-3
2002  Andre Agassi bt. Roger Federer 6-3, 6-3, 3-6, 6-4
2001  Andre Agassi bt. Jan-Michael Gambill 7-6, 6-1, 6-0
2000  Pete Sampras bt. Gustavo Kuerten 6-1, 6-7, 7-6, 7-6

data.title: MONTE CARLO
data.body:
The Monte-Carlo Rolex Masters, which celebrated its 100th anniversary in 2006, is the first of three ATP World Tour Masters 1000 tournaments played on clay. Past winners include Bjorn Borg, Thomas Muster, Gustavo Kuerten, Juan Carlos Ferrero and Rafael Nadal.

Past Winners

2013 Stan Wawrinka bt. David Ferrer 6-1 7-6 (3)
2013 Novak Djokovic bt. Rafael Nadal 6-2, 7-6 (1)
2012 Rafael Nadal bt. Novak Djokovic 6-3, 6-1
2011 Rafael Nadal bt. David Ferrer 6-4, 7-5
2010  Rafael Nadal bt. Fernando Verdasco 6-0, 6-1
2009  Rafael Nadal bt. Novak Djokovic 6-3, 2-6, 6-1
2008  Rafael Nadal bt. Roger Federer 7-5, 7-5
2007  Rafael Nadal bt. Roger Federer 6-4, 6-4
2006  Rafael Nadal bt. Roger Federer 6-2, 6-7, 6-3, 7-6
2005  Rafael Nadal bt. Guillermo Coria 6-3, 6-1, 0-6, 7-5
2004  Guillermo Coria bt. Rainer Schuttler 6-2, 6-1, 6-3
2003  Juan Carlos Ferrero bt. Guillermo Coria 6-2, 6-2
2002  Juan Carlos Ferrero bt. Carlos Moya 7-5, 6-3, 6-4
2001  Gustavo Kuerten bt. Hicham Arazi 6-3, 6-2, 6-4
2000  Cedric Pioline bt. Dominik Hrbaty 6-4, 7-6, 7-6
